# maxAbsSlope

**Instance Property**

The maximum absolute slope at the location toward all directions, measured in degrees.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxAbsSlope: Double? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the maximum absolute slope is invalid due to low GPS accuracy, this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0].

## Getting speed and slope

- **speed**: The instantaneous velocity of the device, measured in meters per second.
- **slope**: The slope at the location toward the direction of travel, measured in degrees.
